title: BINUS Digital Museum
description: A kiosk information about BINUS Digital Museum. Best view in resolution 1920x1080 pixels because it would show in the big screen (55 inch, Android TV) at BINUS Alam Sutera.

title: 3D Annotation System
description: This is one of new features of my Initiative Project (3Digibees) for BINUS. It's a 3D Annotation system using Model-Viewer. This is just a prototype, because the real project need you to login using BINUS account to use the features.

title: 3Digibees
description: Website repository for 3D models like Sketchfab. This website is one of my initiative project for BINUS University. Binusian can upload their 3D models and share it using iframe code like Youtube.
